Abstract: This dataset represents the location of Regional Metro Stations in Washington, DC 2007

    <descript>
      <abstract>This dataset represents the location of Regional Metro Stations in Washington, DC 2007</abstract>
      <purpose>This data is used for the planning and management of Washington, D.C. by local government agencies.</purpose>
    </descript>

      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied from the cd obtained from the CD obtained from Washington, DC 2005

Platform centroids were identified from visual observation of orthophotography and extracted planimetric data and a centroid for each heads-up digitized from the 1995 orthophotographs. Attribute data was provided by the WMATA website.

Planimetrics were created at a scale of 1:1,000. This means that a well defined feature falls within two feet of true position.

All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters.
</procdesc>
        <procdate>20010806</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>
              <cntorg>D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer</cntorg>
              <cntper>GIS Data Coordinator</cntper>
            </cntorgp>
            <cntaddr>
              <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype>
              <address>441 4th St NW, Suite 930 South</address>
              <city>Washington</city>
              <state>DC</state>
              <postal>20001</postal>
              <country>USA</country>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice/>
            <cntfax>(202) 727-5660</cntfax>
            <cntemail>dcgis@dc.gov</cntemail>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Metadata imported.</procdesc>
        <srcused>C:\DOCUME~1\mark\LOCALS~1\Temp\xml5D.tmp</srcused>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Metadata imported.</procdesc>
        <srcused>C:\OCTOGIS\MetadataData\SDE.MetroStn.xml</srcused>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>

        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied.</procdesc>
        <srcused>C:\temp\MetroStnPt</srcused>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>For the blue line extension, platform centroids were identified from visual observation of orthophotography and a centroid for each heads-up digitized from the 2003 orthophotographs.  Also, using the more accurate metro lines from the WMATA Surveyor's office, staff moved the stations to better fit with the metro lines.  Attribute data was provided by the WMATA website.</procdesc>
        <procdate>2005</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>
              <cntorg>Office of the Chief Technology Officer</cntorg>
              <cntper>GIS Data Coordinatro</cntper>
            </cntorgp>
            <cntaddr>
              <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype>
              <address>441 4th St NW, Suite 930 South</address>
              <city>Washington</city>
              <state>DC</state>
              <postal>20001</postal>
              <country>USA</country>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice/>
            <cntfax>202-727-5660</cntfax>
            <cntemail>dcgis@dc.gov</cntemail>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>An ADDRESS field was added and populated using data from WMATA's website.</procdesc>
        <procdate>2006</procdate>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>A LINE field was added.  The field describe the color of the line each station is located on.</procdesc>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied.</procdesc>
        <srcused>Server=10.1.11.144; Service=5151; User=dcgis_user; Version=SDE.DEFAULT</srcused>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied.</procdesc>
        <srcused>G:\GIS\Temp\Metro UPDATES\MetroStnFullPt</srcused>
        <procdate/>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Staff modified the layer to reflect the yellow line extension.</procdesc>
        <procdate>2007</procdate>

      </procstep>

        <srcused>W:\DCGISDATA_WORKSPACE\WMATA\Metro\Full\MetroStnFullPt</srcused>
        <procdate/>
